species.name: lechonk
descriptions: It searches for food all day. It possesses a keen sense of smell but doesn’t use it for anything other than foraging.
This Pokémon spurns all but the finest of foods. Its body gives off an herblike scent that bug Pokémon detest.

abilities.name: aroma-veil
abilities.effect: Protects allies against moves that affect their mental state.

abilities.name: gluttony
abilities.effect: Makes the Pokémon eat any held Berry triggered by low HP below 1/2 its max HP.

abilities.name: thick-fat
abilities.effect: Halves damage from fire and ice moves.
